document.full_text: the march 11 japan earthquake and tsunami are likely to have caused up to $34 billion in losses for the global insurance industry, catastrophe modeling company rms said on tuesday.
document.title: rms estimates japan insured losses up to $34 bln
lines_and_colors: the march 11 japan earthquake and tsunami are likely to have caused up to $34 billion in losses for the global insurance industry, catastrophe modeling company rms said on tuesday.
